item.title: Canopy Growth Corp 10-K
item.description: Canopy Growth Corp, which is in the Medicinal Chemicals & Botanical Products [2833] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 31, 2022 had 66850 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: cannabis - 844 instances may - 601 instances 31 - 546 instances march - 531 instances products - 501 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
